original_text: Now I will speak against the things that you do. You think that they are good and right, but those things will not help you. Now I will speak against the things that you do.
korean_text: 네 공의를 내가 보이리라 네가 행한 일이 네게 무익하니라

sentences.original_text: Now I will speak against the things that you do.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 네가 하는 행동들을 반대하여 말하겠다.

sentences.original_text: You think that they are good and right,
but those things will not help you.
Now I will speak against the things that you do.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 네가 하는 행동들을 반대하여 말하겠다.
